message.content:
cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.ROBOTS. 

The paper deals with the control of microrobot teams to accomplish complex micromanipulation tasks, which falls under the scope of robotics (cs.RO). The proposed algorithm involves optimal control synthesis, which is a common technique used in control systems (cs.SY). The use of Linear Temporal Logic (LTL) formulas and product automaton also suggests a connection to formal methods and verification (cs.MA). The paper also involves the use of local magnetic fields to execute the synthesized plans, which could be considered as a form of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper specifically mentions the term "robots" in the title, which suggests that the paper could also be classified under the sub-category of cs.ROBOTS.
